detail_desc: Long, padded jacket in nylon with a detachable, lined hood and small stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour elasticated waistband and 3/4-length legs.
Skirt in washed denim with front pockets and buttons down the front.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Jersey top with removable shoulder pads, long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs, and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baseball jacket in cotton chambray with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the neckline.
High-waisted jersey crêpe trousers with contrasting colour side stripes, an elasticated waist and flared legs with sewn-in creases.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim made from a soft, stretch Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist and slim, straight legs.

Blouse in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shirt jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar, zip down the front, flap chest pockets and discreet diagonal side pockets. Sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt top and bottoms in soft jersey with a print motif. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Sandals with adjustable foot straps and a loop at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles, fluted underneath.
Metal hoop earrings, one pair with a pattern. Diameter 2 cm and 3 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges. V-shaped waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist with wide elastication, a fake fly and pockets in the side seams with metal details.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Necklace of thin metal chains, two of which have a pendant. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.

Shorter, padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, two flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Biker jacket in washed stretch twill with hard worn details and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short nightdress in printed cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Longer, wide-fitting jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with covered buttons at the front. Small stand-up collar, an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Short top in jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.
Wide, gently draping trousers in a soft, fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Regular, elasticated waist.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Loose-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and a racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms. Elastication and hook and loop tab at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Thinsulate™ lining.
Single-breasted coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Metal hoop earrings. Diameter 4 cm.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and button at the back, a high waist with pleats all round, and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Biker jacket in soft, supple leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Zipped chest pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight, fine-knit cardigan in a soft merino wool blend with a zip down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.3 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Fine-knit jumper in soft wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a glittery appliqué at the front.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and gently tapered legs with decorative beads down the sides.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in a cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, side pockets, fake welt pockets with a button at the back, and wide legs.
CONSCIOUS. Short shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and skirt in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim. Skirt with an all-over print, elastication and a frill trim at the waist, and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, an imitation suede peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a small frill trim at the top, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.

Set with dungarees and a long-sleeved top in soft cotton. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, elastication at the back of the waist, flap side pockets with press-studs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top in slub jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Top in a relaxed fit with long dolman sleeves.

Necklaces in different designs. One thin metal chain necklace with a textured medallion. Adjustable length 53-60 cm. One necklace with semi-precious stones and metal beads. Adjustable length 42-49 cm.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hair clips decorated with fabric flowers. Length 4.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Fitted lace dress with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Jersey lining.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back.
Trousers in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and organic cotton blend. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, front pockets and wide, straight legs with narrow ribbing at the hems.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Imitation leather biker jacket decorated with metal studs and embroidered flowers. Diagonal zip, press-studs on the notch lapels, shoulder tabs and zips at the cuffs. Front pockets, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a concealed press-stud. Lined.

Knee-length lace dress with a round neck and V-shaped mesh section at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with a raw-edge lace trim at the cuffs, and concealed elastication at the waist. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline, a flounced trim around the shoulders, and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Calf-length trousers in a viscose crêpe weave with diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs. Covered elastication and a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.
Top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with a text print and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
